T02D2652:302a-3: mchod rten sgrub pa'i cho ga / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo//
T02D2652:302a-4: gang gis sku gsum brnyes te 'gro don mthar phyin pa /
T02D2652:302a-5: de la phyag 'tshal nas ni de nyid bsgrub bya'i phyir /
T02D2652:302a-6: rang gis rtogs pa gtsor byas lung kun tshul mi 'gal //
T02D2652:302a-7: rnal 'byor gzhung lugs mchod rten bshad par bya /
T02D2652:302a-8: de la dang por gnas dben pa yid du 'ong
T02D2652:302a-9: bar byi dor byas la ji skad bshad pa'i sa
T02D2652:302a-10: sbyang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga byas te /
T02D2652:302a-11: der stegs bu ji ltar mos pa byas la ba'i
T02D2652:302a-12: lci ba dang tsandan dang gur kum la sogs pa
T02D2652:302a-13: ci 'byor ba'i dri zhim po'i chus skyang nul byas
T02D2652:302a-14: te me tog gi sil ma bkram /
T02D2652:302a-15: nye 'khor spos chus chag chag gdab /
T02D2652:302a-16: bla re dang 'phan la sogs pa dag dang rol mo'i rnam pa dag dang /
T02D2652:302a-17: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dag dang /
T02D2652:302a-18: mchod ba'i bye brag rnams 'byor tshad bshams la gzhag
T02D2652:302a-19: / gzhan yang mchod rten nam tsha tsha'i yo byad
T02D2652:302a-20: skol por dang / sku gdung dang /
T02D2652:302a-21: rtsa ba'i snying po'am rten 'brel gyi snying po dang /
T02D2652:302a-22: gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs dang ;
T02D2652:302a-23: 'bru mar ga bur la sogs pa dri zhim pos bsgyur ba dang /
T02D2652:302a-24: phag ze dang gang gi don du bya ba'i ming dang /
T02D2652:302a-25: me tog la sogs te mchod pa lnga dang /
T02D2652:302a-26: 'khor lo la sogs pa dag kyang bshams te gzhag
T02D2652:302a-27: / tsha tsha 'debs pa'i slob dpon la sogs pa
T02D2652:302a-28: kun kyang ji skad gsungs pa'i khrus dag byas te
T02D2652:302a-29: / gos gtsang ma bgo ba dang rgyan gyis brgyan te /
T02D2652:302a-30: shar dang nub gang bde bar stan bting ste sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D2652:302a-31: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2652:302a-32: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2652:302a-34: phyag bzhi pas phyag bya ste /
T02D2652:302a-35: cho ga'i rim pa rang gi lugs bzhin byas la
T02D2652:302b-0: @302b mnyam par bzhag nas rtag tu byams pa dang
T02D2652:302b-1: ldan pa'i sems kyis mchod rten gdab par bya'o //
T02D2652:302b-2: mchod rten gdab pa'i sa gar brko ba'i gnas der
T02D2652:302b-3: brtag cing byin gyis brlabs te bgegs bskrad pa dang
T02D2652:302b-4: / gtor ma byin te tshon skud la sngags /
T02D2652:302b-5: aom badzra su tra sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02D2652:302b-6: ces bya ba dang rdo rje'i skud par bsams la /
T02D2652:302b-7: sa khyon ci ran tsam tshon skud kyis bskor te /
T02D2652:302b-8: seng ldeng ngam lcags phur byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang sngags bzlas te gdab bo //
T02D2652:302b-9: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba dusht'an h'um phat /
T02D2652:302b-10: phur bu'i sngags de lan bdun bzlas la dbus dang phyogs bzhir gdab bo //
T02D2652:302b-11: yungs kar dang spos chu bsres la sngags bzlas la phyogs der gtor ro //
T02D2652:302b-12: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang phyag rgya bya'o //
T02D2652:302b-13: de nas ci tsam 'dod pa'i sa de dag brko'o //
T02D2652:302b-14: sngags la aom badzra kha na kha n'a ya h'um phat /
T02D2652:302b-16: sa gzhi de nyid rin po cher gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2652:302b-17: de nas brkos te cho ga pa dang h'um bzhis phur bu thams cad bton la /
T02D2652:302b-18: aom ru ru spu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa ni sarba aartha s'a dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:302b-19: zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i 'o mas phur bu bkrus te bu gar blugs so //
T02D2652:302b-20: sa blangs pa rnams kyang phyogs gcig tu snod gtsang ma'i steng du bzhag ste /
T02D2652:302b-21: sa brdung ba'i tho ba la rdo rje tho ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags /
T02D2652:302b-22: aom badzra mudga ra a'a ko ta ya a'a ko ta ya h'um phat /
T02D2652:302b-24: de nas 'jim pa spru pa'i tshe spos chu la /
T02D2652:302b-25: aom aa mri te h'um phat /
T02D2652:302b-26: ces bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te byin
T02D2652:302b-27: gyis brlabs la spos chu de aa dkar po las
T02D2652:302b-28: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te /
T02D2652:302b-29: de'i 'od zer gyis spos chu nyid khyab par 'khyil
T02D2652:302b-30: nas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsams la
T02D2652:302b-31: spru'o // sngags la aom badzra pra marda n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:302b-33: de nas 'jim pa de la bdud rtsi thab sbyor
T02D2652:302b-34: gyi phyag rgya lag pa g-yon pa'i thal mo pang
T02D2652:302b-35: bar bkan la mthe'u chung gi sen mo mthe bos
T02D2652:302b-36: mnan te / sor mo gsum nas re tsam phye
T02D2652:302b-37: ste gzhag pa'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa'i thal
T02D2652:302b-39: g-yon pa ltar byas te 'jim pa'i steng du bzhag la rig pa chen mo'i sngags /
T02D2652:302b-40: aom sukshme sukshme sukshma aa nu ga te nir ku
T02D2652:302b-41: le nirba ni sarba buddha y'a nu ga te ya
T02D2652:302b-42: sho ba ti ya sho dzi ni dharma dh'a tu
T02D2652:303a-2: sarba buddha aa dhishthi te sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:303a-3: zhes lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la byin gyis
T02D2652:303a-4: brlabs pas de las ye shes kyi 'od zer phyogs
T02D2652:303a-5: bcur 'phros pas sems can gyi don byas te slar
T02D2652:303a-6: bsdus bas 'jim pa de nyid rin po che sna
T02D2652:303a-7: lnga'i gong bu'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsam /
T02D2652:303a-8: de nas 'bi 'bi bya ba'i sngags la /
T02D2652:303a-9: aom badzrod bh'a b'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:303a-10: zhes lan bdun bzlas pas ye shes lnga'i 'od zer
T02D2652:303a-11: gyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu mtha' yas par 'phros shing
T02D2652:303a-12: khengs te 'gro ba mang po'i don byas nas /
T02D2652:303a-13: slar 'dus pa 'bi 'bi'i nang du zhugs te thim par gyur pas /
T02D2652:303a-14: ye shes lnga rgyas te shel sgong dag pa ltar bsam mo //
T02D2652:303a-15: rang rang gi sa bon gyis seng ge la sogs pa dang /
T02D2652:303a-16: rin po che'i gdan dang nyi zla dang padma'i gdan khrir phyogs phyogs su gdan bshams la /
T02D2652:303a-17: de rnams kyi dbus su sa bon gyi yi ge
T02D2652:303a-18: dang 'byin pa'i yi ges rang rang gi sgrub thabs
T02D2652:303a-19: las ji skad gsungs pa dang /
T02D2652:303a-20: ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2652:303a-21: rnal 'byor gsum gyis rdzogs pa phyag rgya bzhi dang
T02D2652:303a-22: ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rim pa bzhin du
T02D2652:303a-23: rang rang gi sgrub thabs las bstan pa ji bzhin
T02D2652:303a-24: du byas te / tsandan gyi lde gus thig le
T02D2652:303a-25: zlum bor byas la byin gyis brlab pa ni h'um
T02D2652:303a-26: dmar po las ye shes kyi me dbung rab tu
T02D2652:303a-27: 'bar bas de nyid du rab tu sbyangs te /
T02D2652:303a-28: gzhi de yang rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsam mo //
T02D2652:303a-29: de nas re re'i gdan du yang padma 'dab ma
T02D2652:303a-30: brgyad pa'i steng du aa dkar po las zla ba'i
T02D2652:303a-32: de'i dbus su gong du bshad pa ltar lha re
T02D2652:303a-33: re nas rang gi rtog ba las 'byung ba ltar
T02D2652:303a-34: bzhugs su gsol te dam tshig sems dpar byas la
T02D2652:303a-35: / ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te lcags kyu
T02D2652:303a-36: la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug pa dang
T02D2652:303a-37: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas te
T02D2652:303a-38: / bsgrub par bya'o // bdag nyid kyang phyag rgya
T02D2652:303a-39: chen po dang ldan pas snying gar zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2652:303a-41: rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga ba las ye shes lnga'i 'od zer 'phro bar bsams la /
T02D2652:303a-42: ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang /
T02D2652:303a-43: bde bar gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa sprin phung ltar mu 'byam par 'phro shing /
T02D2652:303b-0: sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi don @303b mdzad cing byin gyis brlabs nas slar 'dus te /
T02D2652:303b-1: dam tshig sems dpa' de nyid la thim par bsam mo //
T02D2652:303b-2: de nas mchod pa lnga la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2652:303b-3: lha so so'i bstod pa re re nas byas la
T02D2652:303b-4: so so'i phrin las dang dam tshig gi sgo nas
T02D2652:303b-6: de la 'di nyid kyi cho ga'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2652:303b-7: 'bi 'bi'i nang du lta so so'i snying po //
T02D2652:303b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang snying po gong ma gnyis bcug la /
T02D2652:303b-10: sngags badzra dharma dh'a tu garbhe dzva la sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:303b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes de de'i nang du zhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2652:303b-13: de nas skol phor du yungs mar ram til mar gyis bsku pa'i sngags /
T02D2652:303b-14: aom aa ra dze bi ra dza sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:303b-15: zhes gsum brjod pas byang chub kyi sems bsgom par bsam mo //
T02D2652:303b-16: de nas skol phor du gzhug pa'i sngags /
T02D2652:303b-17: aom badzra dh'a tu garbhe sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:303b-19: thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las chos kyi dbyings su bsam mo //
T02D2652:303b-21: aom badzra mudga ra a'a ko ta ya a'a ko ta ya h'um /
T02D2652:303b-22: gong ma'i snying po gnyis kyang brjod la /
T02D2652:303b-23: dbyung ba'i sngags aom dharma ra te sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:303b-25: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2652:303b-26: thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las chos kyi skur grub par bsams te /
T02D2652:303b-27: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dharma k'a ya ma
T02D2652:303b-28: h'a su kha su ra ta sa ma ya stvam
T02D2652:303b-29: / de las gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis byung bas
T02D2652:303b-30: 'gro ba'i don bsam gyis mi khyab par bsams te
T02D2652:303b-31: / / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sambho ga k'a ya sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2652:303b-32: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ni rma na k'a ya sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2652:303b-33: de la dang por mchod rten ni chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan zhes smos te /
T02D2652:303b-34: sa dang rdo dang shing dang gser dngul la sogs
T02D2652:303b-35: pa dag las sems can gyi rtsol bas bsgrubs te
T02D2652:303b-36: / dbyibs kyi bye brag tu byas pa de dag ni gzugs brnyan zhes gdags te /
T02D2652:303b-39: chos kyi sku ni sku med nam mkha' 'dra //
T02D2652:303b-41: brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin yang chos
T02D2652:303b-42: thams cad kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i don gyis mchod
T02D2652:303b-43: rten gyi dbyibs lta bur grub pas /
T02D2652:303b-44: des na chos kyi sku ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i
T02D2652:303b-45: chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de la chos
T02D2652:304a-2: / de bas na 'di ltar snang ba ni gzugs brnyan yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2652:304a-3: yang na gzugs 'di ltar grub ba ni sku gsum gyi tshul yin te rmang dge ba bcu dang /
T02D2652:304a-4: bang rim dang po nas kha khyer gyi bar du
T02D2652:304a-5: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
T02D2652:304a-6: dang / srog shing shes pa bcu'i bar du rgyu'i
T02D2652:304a-7: chos bsod nams kyi tshogs yin te sprul ba'i sku
T02D2652:304a-8: dang / yin pa dang / 'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu dang /
T02D2652:304a-9: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /
T02D2652:304a-10: char khebs thugs rje chen po dang /
T02D2652:304a-11: zla tshes byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D2652:304a-12: me long ye shes gzhi dang ;
T02D2652:304a-13: tog mngon par shes pa drug dang /
T02D2652:304a-14: dar gyi cod pan dang gdugs kyis chos kyi skur
T02D2652:304a-15: mnga' gsol te chos kyi rgyal por gyur pa dang
T02D2652:304a-16: / chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyan chen po ste /
T02D2652:304a-17: nam mkha' lding gi kha nas byung ba ni thams
T02D2652:304a-18: cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs dang ye shes
T02D2652:304a-20: ba dan chos kyi grags pa chen po dang /
T02D2652:304a-21: dril bu snyan pas phyogs bcur khyab ba dang /
T02D2652:304a-22: rdo rings mi 'jigs pa bzhi brnyes pa dang /
T02D2652:304a-23: them skas srung ba med pa gsum mam so so
T02D2652:304a-24: yang dag par rig pa bzhi'am rnam par thar ba
T02D2652:304a-25: bzhi ste / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med
T02D2652:304a-26: pa dang smon pa med pa dang chos thams cad
T02D2652:304a-27: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pa'i
T02D2652:304a-29: dril bu tshangs pa'i dbyangs sam gsung yan lag drug
T02D2652:304a-30: cu dang ldan pas de dag ni 'bras bu'i chos
T02D2652:304a-31: ye shes kyi tshogs yin pas chos kyi skur bstan
T02D2652:304a-32: pa dang / aa ma la sar rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
T02D2652:304a-33: gzhan yang rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis
T02D2652:304a-34: sbras pa mdzes pa dang blta bas chog mi shes
T02D2652:304a-35: pa sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tshim par
T02D2652:304a-36: byed pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste de dag
T02D2652:304a-37: ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos te /
T02D2652:304a-38: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang byang chub sems
T02D2652:304a-39: dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa spyi la bstan pa'i
T02D2652:304a-40: tshes shin tu rgya che ba'o //
T02D2652:304a-41: de bas na 'di ni sku gsum gyi dam tshig
T02D2652:304a-42: gi sems dpar byas la dus gsum gyi bde bar
T02D2652:304a-44: dkyil 'khor gang dang gang la mos pa'i lha rnams sku gsum brnyes pa'am /
T02D2652:304a-45: ldan pa de dag gi sku gsum ye shes kyi
T02D2652:304b-0: sems dpa' chos @304b kyi dbyings nas spyan drangs te
T02D2652:304b-1: / bstims nas bsgrub pa ni lcags kyu la sogs
T02D2652:304b-2: pa sngags dang phyag rgya dang gong du bstan pa'i
T02D2652:304b-3: sku gsum gyi snying pos bya'o //
T02D2652:304b-5: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:304b-6: sems can thams cad shes pa bcu dang ldan par
T02D2652:304b-7: gyur cig / bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dam
T02D2652:304b-8: pa'i chos yun ring du mi nub par gyur cig
T02D2652:304b-9: / sems can thams cad lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam
T02D2652:304b-10: par dag pas kun du bzang po'i smon lam la
T02D2652:304b-11: 'jug par gyur cig /'khor lo'i sngags la /
T02D2652:304b-12: aom pra marda na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:304b-13: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
T02D2652:304b-14: dang ma 'dres pa'i dran ba nye bar gzhag pa
T02D2652:304b-15: gsum thob par gyur cig / rnam par thar pa
T02D2652:304b-16: brgyad thob par gyur cig / ye shes bzhi dang
T02D2652:304b-17: ldan par gyur cig / dar gyi cod pan gyi
T02D2652:304b-18: sngags la / aom pa kam pa la sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:304b-19: sems can thams cad dus dang rnam pa thams cad
T02D2652:304b-20: du dar gyi lhab lhub la sogs pa mchod pa
T02D2652:304b-21: dang bsnyen bkur gyi rnam pa mang pos de bzhin
T02D2652:304b-23: de dag gi mchod rten dang sku gzugs dang gsung
T02D2652:304b-24: rab la sogs pa yang dag pa la mchod pa
T02D2652:304b-25: byed par gyur cig / ba dan gyi sngags la
T02D2652:304b-26: / aom p'a tam ke sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:304b-27: sems can thams cad chos kyi grags pa dang snyan
T02D2652:304b-28: pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig
T02D2652:304b-29: / chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi sngags la /
T02D2652:304b-30: aom kumbhi ra dhva dza sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:304b-31: sems can thams cad 'khor ba mi spong ba'i bdud
T02D2652:304b-32: bzhi las rgyal zhing chos mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan
T02D2652:304b-33: du gyur cig / gdugs kyi sngags la /
T02D2652:304b-34: aom pra ma na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:304b-35: sems can thams cad bla na me dpa'i skyabs dang
T02D2652:304b-36: ldan zhing chos kyi rgyal po chen por gyur cig
T02D2652:304b-37: / me tog gi phreng ba'i sngags la /
T02D2652:304b-40: na ma: shre ya dh'a nu ga ta pra tishtha ta /
T02D2652:304b-41: pushpe ke ta be ta th'a ga t'a ya /
T02D2652:304b-45: sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan
T02D2652:304b-46: to blta bas chog mi shes pa phun sum tshogs
T02D2652:304b-47: pa thob par gyur cig / gdan dbul pa'i sngags
T02D2652:304b-48: la / aom sunda ri dza ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:304b-49: sems can thams cad gdan gyi khyad par stobs bcu dang ldan la glang bo che'i gdan dang /
T02D2652:304b-50: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa seng ge'i gdan dang /
T02D2652:305a-1: gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa rta'i gdan dang /
T02D2652:305a-2: dbang bcu dang ldan pa rma bya'i gdan dang /
T02D2652:305a-3: thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i shugs dang ldan pa'i nam mkha' lding gi gdan dang /
T02D2652:305a-4: dgos 'dod re ba yid bzhin du byung ba rin po che'i gdan dang /
T02D2652:305a-5: chags pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa padma'i gdan dang /
T02D2652:305a-6: thams cad du rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi
T02D2652:305a-7: ma dang zla ba'i gdan thob par gyur cig /
T02D2652:305a-8: de nas mchod rten la na bza' gsol ba'i sngags
T02D2652:305a-9: la / aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a ba bi shuddhe dharma te sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:305a-10: gzhal yas khang du gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags la /
T02D2652:305a-11: aom dha ra dha ra ku ta ga ra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:305a-12: bzhugs su gsol ba'i sngags la /
T02D2652:305a-13: aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:305a-15: rin po che'i gzhal med khang chos kyi dbyings zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs par bsams /
T02D2652:305a-16: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag
T02D2652:305a-17: rgya bcings la dbur bzhag ste dbang bskur bar bya'o
T02D2652:305a-18: // sngags la aom badzra bh'a tu aa dhi tishtha h'um /
T02D2652:305a-19: de ltar dbang bskur bas de'i ngo bo nyid du brtan par gyur pa yin no //
T02D2652:305a-20: de ltar mchod rten gdab pa yang sngar bshad pa ltar rim pa bzhin bya ste /
T02D2652:305a-21: dang por mnyam par bzhag ste /
T02D2652:305a-22: chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas /
T02D2652:305a-23: 'gro ba mtha' dag dang gang gi don du bya
T02D2652:305a-24: ba de la byams pa dang snying rjes 'di skad
T02D2652:305a-25: brjod par bya'o // ngo mtshar chen po grangs med
T02D2652:305a-26: pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T02D2652:305a-27: 'das thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02D2652:305a-28: bdag gis sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ngo //
T02D2652:305a-29: bdud la sogs pa pas kyi rgol ba bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad pham par bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305a-30: sems can rnams nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa bsal bar bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305a-31: nga rgyal gyi ri bo bsnyil bar bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305a-32: skye ba'i ljon shing rtsad nas gcod do //
T02D2652:305a-33: 'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye mar brlag go //
T02D2652:305a-34: ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal bar bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305a-35: ma dad pa dang phyi rol bdag dang lta ba
T02D2652:305a-36: phyin ci log pa dag yang dag pa'i lta ba
T02D2652:305a-37: la gzud cing dad par bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305a-38: las kyi chu bo bzlog par bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305a-39: srid pa'i rgya mtsho bskam bar bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305a-40: chos kyi sgron ma rab tu sbar bar bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305a-41: byang chub kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305b-0: bzod pa dang @305b des pa la gzud par bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305b-1: bsam gtan gyi bde ba la cher stsal to //
T02D2652:305b-2: 'dod chags kyi me dpung zhi bar bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305b-3: zhe sdang gi mtshon rnon po bcil bar bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305b-5: phrag dog gi 'tshub ma zhi bar bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305b-6: ser sna'i mdud ba dgrol bar bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305b-7: sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305b-9: bde ba chen po'i grong khyer du 'jug cing gnas par bgyi'o //
T02D2652:305b-10: de bas na bdag la las kyi dngos grub mchog stsal nas gnang ba dam pa mdzad du gsol /
T02D2652:305b-11: de nas gong du bshad pa ji bzhin du byas
T02D2652:305b-12: la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D2652:305b-13: pa dag dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang bcas
T02D2652:305b-14: te / tshul bzhin du so so'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang /
T02D2652:305b-15: sngags dang phyag rgya dang cho ga go rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2652:305b-16: yang na ye shes lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten
T02D2652:305b-17: rang bzhin gyis dag cing gsal ba de dag gi
T02D2652:305b-18: bum pa'i dbus su gong du smos pa'i snying po
T02D2652:305b-19: gang yang rung ba bcug la de dag las ye
T02D2652:305b-20: shes kyi 'od zer grangs med pa 'phros pas de
T02D2652:305b-21: bzhin gshegs pa'i sku grangs med pa'i sprin phung gis
T02D2652:305b-22: nam mkha'i mtha' klas shing chos kyi dbyings mur thug
T02D2652:305b-23: par brgyan zhing bklubs par gyur nas 'jig rten thams
T02D2652:305b-24: cad byin gyis brlabs te 'gro ba thams cad kyi
T02D2652:305b-25: don mdzad cing re ba bskangs nas slar 'dus de
T02D2652:305b-26: nyid kyi dbu'i spyi gtsug dang thugs kar thim pas
T02D2652:305b-27: bsgrub par bya ba de'i las dang nyon mongs pa
T02D2652:305b-28: la sogs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag
T02D2652:305b-29: ste / sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par bsams la /
T02D2652:305b-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'a ka tsitta ma h'a sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2652:305b-32: sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas bya ba'am /
T02D2652:305b-33: phyag rgya bzhis brtan par byas te /
T02D2652:305b-34: dung phor gyi nang du dri spos sna tshogs dang /
T02D2652:305b-35: 'bras yos dang 'o mar ldan pa'i mchod yon gsol te /
T02D2652:305b-36: aargha'i phyag rgya'i steng du dung por bzhag la yon
T02D2652:305b-37: chab kyi nang du aa dkar po las zla ba'i
T02D2652:305b-38: dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i 'od zer gyis yon chab
T02D2652:305b-39: nyid bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsams la
T02D2652:305b-40: / so so'i rigs kyi snying po bzlas la dbul lo //
T02D2652:305b-41: aom aa mri te aargham dh'u pe pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:305b-42: zhes lan gsum spyi por bzhag ste sbreng ngo //
T02D2652:306a-0: @306a * // 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par gyur cig / phyag
T02D2652:306a-1: rgya rgya mtsho sprin nyid kyi dbu'i gtsug tu bkram
T02D2652:306a-2: ste ye shes kyi 'od zer 'dus pa'i sku nang
T02D2652:306a-3: du thim zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang bskur bar
T02D2652:306a-4: bsam mo // de nas mchod pa lnga dang mchod pa nyi shu dang /
T02D2652:306a-5: sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyis mchod pa dang /
T02D2652:306a-6: mchod pa thams cad rnam par sbyang zhing dag par bya ba'i sngags /
T02D2652:306a-7: aom sarba p'u dza a'a yu sv'a h'a /
T02D2652:306a-9: aom las byung ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyang sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas te dbul lo //
T02D2652:306a-10: de nas rdo rje dang dril bu blangs la bstod pa bya'o //
T02D2652:306a-11: 'gro ba rgyu lnga'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du /
T02D2652:306a-12: sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gyis gzir 'gro gzigs nas //
T02D2652:306a-13: thugs rjes sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor 'joms mdzad pa //
T02D2652:306a-14: thugs rje'i bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2652:306a-15: sems can smin cing grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir //
T02D2652:306a-16: sems can khams na bzhugs ba'i spyod gyur kyang //
T02D2652:306a-17: chags pas ma gos padma ltar dag pa //
T02D2652:306a-18: 'dod chags dag pa'i bdag nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D2652:306a-19: sems can bkres pa chos kyis phongs gyur pa //
T02D2652:306a-20: ma rig thibs po'i nang du song ba rnams //
T02D2652:306a-21: 'phags pa'i nor bdun bdag gis tshim mdzad pa //
T02D2652:306a-22: ye shes sgron ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2652:306a-23: sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa la //
T02D2652:306a-24: thugs rjes thabs dang shes rab grur zhugs nas //
T02D2652:306a-25: zhi ba rin chen mchog gling skyel mdzad pa //
T02D2652:306a-26: kun gyi ded dpon khyed la rnam par 'dud //
T02D2652:306a-27: sems can las kyi chu bos bdas pa rnams /
T02D2652:306a-28: dam chos bdud rtsi'i zam pas sgrol mdzad cing ;
T02D2652:306a-29: /'phags lam yan lag brgyad la sbyor mdzad pa //
T02D2652:306a-30: gsung gi mnga' bdag khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2652:306a-31: de nas smon lam rgya cher gdab po //
T02D2652:306a-32: bdag cag gis che ge'i don du chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bzhengs su gsol te /
T02D2652:306a-33: mchod cing bstod de bsgrubs pa la sogs pa dag
T02D2652:306a-34: pa'i rtsa ba 'dis che ge mo la sogs pa'i
T02D2652:306a-35: sems can thams cad 'khor bas mtshams sbyor ba'i bag
T02D2652:306a-36: chags thams cad rtsad nas gcod de sku gsum yongs
T02D2652:306a-37: su rdzogs par gyur cig / mchod rten gcig byas
T02D2652:306a-38: pas kyang che ge mo la sogs pa'i sems can
T02D2652:306a-39: thams cad kyi tshe rabs bye bar bsags pa'i sdig
T02D2652:306b-0: pa @306b thams cad byang bar gyur cig la sogs
T02D2652:306b-1: pa smon lam gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bya'o //
T02D2652:306b-2: de ltar mchod rten grub pa'i rtags gsungs pa /
T02D2652:306b-4: yang na gzugs kyi zhal 'dzum mam //
T02D2652:306b-5: dri dang dud pa 'od kyang rung //
T02D2652:306b-6: snang ngam yang na ngad ldang ngam //
T02D2652:306b-7: lha la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni //
T02D2652:306b-8: sna tshogs bar snang snang gyur tam //
T02D2652:306b-10: me tog la sogs 'bab pa dang //
T02D2652:306b-11: dung dang rnga la sogs pa'i sgra //
T02D2652:306b-12: dril bu pi wang la sogs rnams //
T02D2652:306b-13: ci ste mtshan ma de dag ni //
T02D2652:306b-14: sdig pa'i blos ni ma mthong na //
T02D2652:306b-15: 'bum gyi phrag ni brgya stong ngam//
T02D2652:306b-16: ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du //
T02D2652:306b-17: de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod nas ni //
T02D2652:306b-18: mnyam par bzhag pas bzlas pa bya //
T02D2652:306b-19: de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang //
T02D2652:306b-20: mtshan gcig mi nyal thog thag bzlas //
T02D2652:306b-21: de nas de yi sdig pa ni //
T02D2652:306b-22: dag pa nyid du nges par mthong //
T02D2652:306b-24: mchod rten cho ga bdag gis cung zad tsam //
T02D2652:306b-25: byas la bsod nams rnam pa ci yod pa //
T02D2652:306b-26: des ni 'gro kun skye shi rgyun bcad de //
T02D2652:306b-27: bla med sku gsum rdzogs te sangs rgyas shog //
T02D2652:306b-28: / bi ma la aushin'a sha'i gzungs las mchod rten
T02D2652:306b-29: sgrub pa'i cho ga rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang bsdebs
